CustomField.formula: OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_HowTo', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_KnownError', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_Standard', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_Resolution', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_Alarm', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_TechnicalProcedure' )
CustomField.label: Knowledge Record Type Check
